short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds browser tab tracking to the Unitraverse client application, enabling bookmarking and automation for web resources

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds tab-tracking support to the Unitraverse client application. Allows the web application to open and close individual, as well as groups of, web endpoints (a.k.a. browser tabs). More info is available at http://www.unitraverse.com
